actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law

official_title: To limit investor and homeowner losses in foreclosures, and for other purposes.
short_title: Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2014

summary.text: Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2014 - Authorizes a bankruptcy court to establish a loss mitigation program for the negotiation of consensual alternatives to avoid foreclosure between an individual debtor and the holder of a claim secured by a security interest in the debtor's principal residence.

titles.title: Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2014
To limit investor and homeowner losses in foreclosures, and for other purposes.
